/**********************************************************************
 * $show_all_signals example 2 -- Verilog HDL test bench.

 * Verilog test bench to test the $show_all_signals PLI application on
 * a 1-bit adder modeled using gate primitives.

 *   Contact: www.sutherland.com or (503) 692-0898
 *********************************************************************/
`timescale 1ns / 1ns
module top;
  integer    test;
  tri  [1:0] results;

  addbit i1 (test[0], test[1], test[2], results[0], results[1]);

  initial
    begin: local
      reg foobar;
      test = 3'b000;
      #1 test = 3'b011;

      #1 $show_all_signals;
      #1 $show_all_signals(top.i1);

//      #1 $stop;
      #1 $finish;
    end
endmodule

/*** An RTL level 1 bit adder model ***/
`timescale 1ns / 1ns
module addbit (a, b, ci, sum, co);
  input  a, b, ci;
  output sum, co;

  wire  a, b, ci;
  reg   sum, co;

  always @(a or b or ci)
    {co, sum} = a + b + ci;

  always @(sum)
    $show_all_signals();

endmodule
/*********************************************************************/



[ [ ['module', 'top', ';'],
    [ ['integer', ['test'], ';'],
      ['tri', '[', '1', ':', '0', ']', ['results'], ';'],
      [ 'addbit',
        [ ['i1'],
          [ '(',
            ['test', ['[', '0', ']']],
            ['test', ['[', '1', ']']],
            ['test', ['[', '2', ']']],
            ['results', ['[', '0', ']']],
            ['results', ['[', '1', ']']],
            ')']],
        ';'],
      [ 'initial',
        [ 'begin',
          ':',
          'local',
          ['reg', ['foobar'], ';'],
          [[['test'], '=', "3 'b 000"], ';'],
          [['#', '1'], [[['test'], '=', "3 'b 011"], ';']],
          [['#', '1'], ['$show_all_signals', ';']],
          [['#', '1'], ['$show_all_signals', '(', ['top.i1'], ')', ';']],
          [['#', '1'], ['$finish', ';']],
          'end']]],
    'endmodule'],
  [ [ 'module',
      'addbit',
      '(',
      [['a'], ['b'], ['ci'], ['sum'], ['co']],
      ')',
      ';'],
    [ ['input', 'a', 'b', 'ci', ';'],
      ['output', 'sum', 'co', ';'],
      ['wire', ['a', 'b', 'ci'], ';'],
      ['reg', ['sum'], ['co'], ';'],
      [ 'always',
        ['@', '(', [['a'], ['b'], ['ci']], ')'],
        [ [['{', ['co'], ['sum'], '}'], '=', ['a'], '+', ['b'], '+', ['ci']],
          ';']],
      [ 'always',
        ['@', '(', [['sum']], ')'],
        ['$show_all_signals', '(', ')', ';']]],
    'endmodule']]
